    lgrExtra

    lgrExtra.Rmd

    This vignette is very much work in progress and will contain more examples in the future.

    AppenderDbi - Logging to databases

    Appending to databases is supported but still experimental. Please be aware that the API might change and AppenderDbi and its subclasses are not fit for production use.

    library(lgr)
library(lgrExtra)
library(RSQLite)

lo <- LayoutDbi$new(
  serialized_cols = list(fields = SerializerJson$new()),
  col_types = c(
    level = "INTEGER",
    timestamp = "TEXT",
    logger= "TEXT",
    msg = "TEXT",
    caller = "TEXT",
    foo = "TEXT",
    fields = "TEXT"
  )
)

ap <- lgrExtra::AppenderDbi$new(
  conn = DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), 'log.db'),
  table = "log",
  layout = lo,

)
#> creating 'log' with columns: level INTEGER, timestamp TEXT, logger TEXT, msg TEXT, caller TEXT, foo TEXT, fields TEXT

lg <- get_logger("test")$add_appender(ap)
  
lg$info("test", foo = "bar", hash = "baz")  
#> INFO  [20:22:18.271] test {foo: bar, hash: baz}

x <- DBI::dbGetQuery(ap$conn, "select * from log")
x  
#>   level        timestamp logger  msg caller foo                     fields
#> 1   400 1609273338.27136   test test   eval bar {"foo":"bar","hash":"baz"}
